parameters.name: IdcName
parameters.description: The name of the data center.

parameters.name: IpSegments
parameters.description: The settings of the CIDR block.

parameters.name: PeriodUnit
parameters.description:
The unit of the scan interval. Valid values:

*   **day**
*   **hour**

parameters.name: Uuids
parameters.description:
The UUID of the server. Separate multiple UUIDs with commas (,).

>  You can call the [DescribeCloudCenterInstances](~~DescribeCloudCenterInstances~~) operation to query the UUID.
